Reviews.Title: False advertising
Reviews.Author: Bruna
Reviews.Content: the photo shows the charger, box and invoice which creates the expectation of coming together, but just got the ipad, false advertising!

Reviews.Title: I love this iPad!
Reviews.Author: AdeleTC
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get an iPad, but didn't want the cost of the new iPad 3.  This iPad was exactly what I was looking for.  Very classy in the black color, it works great, and I use it for EVERYTHING!  I can check email (work and private) on it; I love using it for Netflix and I have the Nook app on it!  Excellent product and alternative to the higher priced iPad 3!  Would definitely recommend.
